articles.author: Billy Witz
articles.title: Congrats on the Heisman Trophy. Now Sign Here and Promise to Not Sell It.
articles.description: Since 1999, winners of college football’s top award have been prohibited from selling their hardware. At least 11 Heismans from older winners have been sold in the last 20 years.
articles.content: What also makes Williams trophy notable is that it is the last one awarded by the now-defunct Downtown Athletic Club and its successor, the Heisman Trust, that its winner is allowed to sell. In the 20 years since, carrying through Saturday nights winner which… [+796 chars]

articles.author: Nicole Hong
articles.title: The Gossiping, Power-Hungry Gambino Crime Family: A Rare Look Inside
articles.description: A case against reputed Mafia members revealed their conversations when their boss was killed.
articles.content:
But as soon as they were released, the government said, they returned to the family business. 
Mr. Martino, who had been known to wear Prada shoes and drive fancy cars, is now accused of hiding his wealth from the government to avoid paying the full $9.1 mil… [+1339 chars]
